results.title: The Contract
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Australian Film Commission and David Ogilvy
results.brief_description: A poignant drama about an ageing couple’s determination to retain their independence and the frustration felt by their son and his young family as they deal with situation. Stars Norma Kaye and Bunny Brooke.

results.title: The Continuous woman
results.brief_description: Entirely the product of collective effort, this film attempts the portrayal of real images of women by looking at five individuals who recognize their strengths and the possibility of alternative roles to those of tradition. Each woman speaks about herself and the portraits merge with one another in a continuous stream of music and photography toward a totality of impression.

results.title: The Consumer game
results.creator_credit: Pyramid Films, Directions Unlimited and Noel Nosseck
results.brief_description: Reviews psychological and motivational techniques used to sell a product. Explains the concepts of comparison shopping, unit pricing, convenient packaging, financing, guarantees and labels. Hosted by Artie Johnston.

results.title: The Consultation
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Frances McGivern and Liz Crosby
results.brief_description: Betty (Leverne McDonnell) sees Larry (Matthew Crosby) across a bar. There is mutual interest, engagement, excitement, and of course, attraction. A stylish, erotic drama with a twist in the tale; a romance for the times we live in.

results.title: The Consequences of nuclear war
results.creator_credit: Australian National University and Ross Christopher
results.brief_description: Highlights of a conference, with the same name as the title, which was held at the Australian National University. The papers dealt with various aspects of the nuclear arms race and were presented by a range of Australian and international speakers.

results.title: The Conquest of the Pacific
results.creator_credit: Government of the Commonwealth of Australia
results.brief_description: A record of the arrival of Kingsford-Smith and Ulm at Brisbane on 9th June 1928, after their first successful flight across the Pacific and their official welcome in Sydney including Kingsford Smith’s broadcast greeting to the people.

results.title: The Conquered dream
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Richard Robinson and Michael McKennirey
results.brief_description: A documentary history of the exciting, sometimes ill-fated exploration of Canada’s Arctic, produced jointly by the British Broadcasting Corporation and the National Film Board of Canada. The film shows the challenge and the rewards of the far north and, from rare film footage, some of the exploits of the first and last men to run the gauntlet of the cold: Byrd’s flight; Stefansson’s sled journey; Captain Bernier’s explorations; and finally, the voyage of the U.S.S. Manhattan. Commentary written and spoken by Stanley Jackson.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Richard Robinson and Michael McKennirey

results.title: The Conquered desert: Libya
results.brief_description: The Libyan Arab Republic since the revolution of September 1969 has progressed in many ways. There has been a development of an infrastructure of industry and agriculture. There is education for all, cultural centres, housing and health services. In fact, total self-sufficiency has been achieved since the revolution.
